DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effects of CO2 inhalation and acetazolamide treatment on exercise-induced periodic breathing in patients with chronic stable heart failure. Patients will be given CO2 (2%) during a constant workload exercise. Patients will be also evaluated by maximal cardiopulmonary exercise test without and with acetazolamide acute and chronic treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Acetazolamide and CO2 Inhalation on Exercise-induced Periodic Breathing in Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: chronic heart failure in stable clinical condition exerciseinduced periodic breathing comorbidities NYHA class IV
